resources.string: In case of data error and abnormal status of the watch, you can upload the data to our server through the problem feedback function for analysis of our after-sales personnel. In this process, the logs generated on the watch will be automatically collected and uploaded. These logs will be used for problems analysis only rather than for other purposes, and will be destroyed immediately after analysis. In the whole process, we will comply with our privacy policies. See privacy policies in Amazfit watch App for details.
"We\'ll collect raw PPG data when you wear the watch. The data will only be used for research purposes. This feature will adversely impact the battery life."
We\'ll collect raw PPG data when you wear the watch. The data will only be used for research purposes. This feature will adversely impact the battery life.
"Tap to turn the HBeacon feature on, so the watch battery may be slightly reduced, and you may need to pair your phone with the watch again after it reboots."
Click Ok to disable HBeacon function. You need to re-match your phone with the watch after the watch is automatically restarted.
Please connect again after turning off the airplane mode

After the motion data acquisition is turned on, we will collect the sensor\'s original information after the start of the exercise, and stop the acquisition immediately after the exercise. These data will be submitted to the server when you submit feedback on the watch issue for analysis by our after-sales staff. During this process, the previously generated logs on the watch will be automatically collected and uploaded. These logs are used only for problem analysis and will not be used as other means and will be destroyed immediately after the analysis. The entire process will comply with our privacy policy. For details, please see the privacy policy on the Amazfit Watch App.
